Public MustInherit Class DataSourceProvider Implements INotifyPropertyChanged, ISupportInitialize
type DataSourceProvider = class interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: Common base class and contract for objects, which are factories that execute some queries to produce a single object or a list of objects that you can use as binding source objects.

span.span: Common base class and contract for objects, which are factories that execute some queries to produce a single object or a list of objects that you can use as binding source objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为方便起见包装现有的数据模型;它不会替换任何数据模型。 is a convenience wrapper around an existing data model; it does not replace any data model. 数据提供程序不会尝试将数据模型，如 ADO 具有几个属性的单个对象到复杂多样。A data provider does not attempt to condense the complexity and versatility of a data model such as ADO into one single object with a few properties. 是一个抽象类。 is an abstract class. 使用的派生类，这些类之一和。Use one of the derived classes, which are and . 感知[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]线程处理和调度程序模型。The is aware of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] threading and dispatcher model. 它在创建时为假定线程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。It assumes the thread at creation time to be the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 事件将从封送工作线程到应用程序的 UI 线程。Events will get marshaled from a worker thread to the UI thread of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意事項：** 可以选择以执行查询，在同一线程或后台线程或使用`IsAsynchronous`。**Notes to Implementers:** You can choose to execute the query on the same thread or on a background thread or using `IsAsynchronous`. 查询完成后，调用具有更新的公共属性。When the query is complete, call to have the public properties updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用作为绑定源时，这是生成的绑定源对象。When the is used as the source of a binding, this is the resulting binding source object.

span.span: Occurs when the property has a new value.

summary.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to change properties of the provider and delay automatic refresh.

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to change properties of the provider and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型用法就是创建`using`范围使用此方法，然后在范围内进行多个属性更改。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple property changes within the scope. 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环循环。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

span.span: Starts the initial query to the underlying data model.

span.span: The result is returned on the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在激活相关的数据绑定，此方法通常由绑定引擎中调用。This method is typically called by the binding engine when dependent data bindings are activated. 设置到`false`以防止或延迟的数据自动加载。Set to `false` to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data. 可以多次调用方法。The method can be called multiple times. 提供程序将忽略后续调用后正忙于执行初始查询;提供程序不会重新启动已在运行查询时会再次调用。The provider ignores subsequent calls once it is busy executing the initial query; the provider does not restart an already running query when is called again. 在查询完成后成功，任何调用仍不会重新查询数据。When the query finishes successfully, any call still does not re-query data. 操作通常是异步的引发事件时属性采用新值。The operation is typically asynchronous, a event is raised when the property assumed a new value. 应用程序调用会导致的数据刷新。The application calls to cause a refresh of the data.

span.span: to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常运行其查询并设置其属性绑定使用的第一个时间或。Typically the runs its query and sets its property the first time it is used by a binding or a . 你可以忽略此步骤，通过设置属性`false`。You can omit this step by setting the property to `false`. 在这种情况下，应用程序必须显式调用导致要获取其数据的提供程序。In this case, the application must explicitly call to cause the provider to obtain its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意事項：** 若要获得超出刷新延迟最佳使用，不要调用当此属性是`true`。**Notes to implementers:** To get the best use out of refresh deferral, do not call when this property is `true`.

summary.span: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.

span.span: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从任何线程调用此回调。This callback can be called from any thread. 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnQueryFinished (object newData, Exception error, System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationCallback completionWork, object callbackArguments);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从任何线程调用此回调。This callback can be called from any thread. 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: Initiates a refresh operation to the underlying data model.

span.span: Initiates a refresh operation to the underlying data model.

summary.span: The result is returned on the property.

span.span: The result is returned on the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刷新操作通常是异步的引发事件时属性采用新值。A refresh operation is typically asynchronous, a event is raised when the property assumed a new value. 如果刷新操作失败，属性设置为`null`;属性设置使用的错误异常。If the refresh operation fails, the property is set to `null`; the property is set with the error exception. 应用程序可以调用仍在进行上次刷新时。The application can call while a previous refresh is still underway. 调用两次引发事件两次。Calling twice raises the event twice.
